extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisites    Level 3 in HLTH,PHED or KINE plan and HLTH101.
Exclusion    No more than 3.0 units from HLTH305; HLTH405

basic.description: An overview of the fundamentals of health policy with an emphasis on the Canadian context. Topics to be discussed include history of the Canadian public health care system; the Canada Health Act; the political and economic environment of the Canadian health care system; issue and challenges in Canadian health policy; and comparative perspectives.
basic.subject: HLTH
basic.title: Fundamentals of Health Policy
